programme.title: Geronimo Stilton S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: Geronimo's house is a mess! His days are too busy with all of life's little details to get everything done, so Benjamin suggests that he advertise to get some help around the house. programme.desc: Two years after a catastrophic earthquake struck Nepal, there are many who continue to live with the repercussions of the seismic disaster. (重)屋燕，是燕子在人工建造的燕屋内筑的巢。洞燕，是燕子在深山岩洞或悬崖峭壁筑的窝。在这一集节目里，李腾先带领观众认识什么是燕窝，接着前往马来西亚，深入了解屋燕和洞燕的采集过程，探讨这两种燕窝的不同之处。

Or do Ben and Chloe - an engaged couple, have many many other variables to take into account? (首播)正要结婚的新婚夫妇，必然会面对买房子的问题。到底该买一间BTO，还是买一间转售组屋呢？要买多大的房子？要住在那里？一连串的疑问，总会在脑海里浮现，挥之不去。就像这一集的Ben和Chloe一样，他们已经订婚了，并准备买一间房子。但和许多正要结婚的夫妇一样，他们发现还有许多因素他们必须考量。

programme.desc: 27-year-old John Chung gave up his university in pursuit of his dream. After 6 years of hard work, John finally owns a retail shoe shop. He has a bigger dream to master the skills and become a professional bespoke shoemaker. 现年27岁的曾荏舜为了追逐梦想，放弃念大学。服完兵役后，他靠着微薄的积蓄投身于售卖二手皮鞋和擦皮鞋生意。潜心专研擦鞋技巧让他在2018年夺下了英国伦敦世界擦鞋比赛的冠军。打拼六年，曾荏舜终于有了自己的鞋店，每天西装笔挺为顾客擦鞋,零售皮鞋，开课传授擦鞋手艺，目前正迈向开创定制皮鞋的梦想迈进。

programme.title: 天空渐渐亮 Daybreak - EP 2

programme.title: 诡探 Detective Psycho - EP 14
programme.desc: Zhang Guonan demands to see Quan when he is brought to the police station for questioning. Guonan wants Quan to help him escape or he will kill Quan's son even if he is kept behind bars. The enraged Quan kills Guonan. 张国南被带到警局问话时坚持要见至全。国南说只要至全协助他逃走，他就会立刻做法救至全的儿子，否则就算他坐牢也会害死至全的儿子。至全被激怒，一气之下把国南杀死。

programme.title: 真命小和尚之十二 铜人 The Return Of Royal Monk - EP 3
programme.desc: The story begins with Kaixin as the abbot of Wulong Temple. The disciplinary master Kongli, who thinks highly of himself, feels slighted that a mere child is made the head of the monastery. Kaixin often thinks of Tietong and is surprised to find someone who looks exactly like his late senior. Kongli asks Baida, who is a hopeless gambler, to impersonate Tietong so as to keep Kaixin under his control. Kaixin falls for the sham and believes that Tietong has reincarnated. (重)二十年后，圆慧的胞弟紫薇真人高居当朝国师。开心小和尚从少林寺调到乌龙寺做主持，使该寺戒律院主管铁空又气又爱，更是搞得县衙门老爷、师爷头痛不已。街头混混百搭阴差阳错成了开心的铁桶师叔，麻烦接踵而来。

programme.title: 名人。心货 Celeb's Curated Collections - EP 13
programme.desc: After 12 episodes, the day of the charity bazaar has arrived. Celebrities graced the event and actively promoted their collectables to the public, in effort to raise as much funds as possible for the beneficiaries! （最后一集）名人明星们的“宝贝”未必价值连城，但在他们的心目中，绝对都是难以衡量的无价之宝！最后一集的《名人。心货》让你目睹义卖会当天的精彩内容，名人明星又如何卖力的推销自己的宝贝筹得善款为慈善献力！《名人心货》为慈善，我们愿意。

programme.title: 荷兰村 Holland V - EP 81
programme.desc: We never knew that the best of nasi lemak and the quirkiest folks could be found in Holland V... Recapture the aroma with the encore telecast. 新传媒首部超过百集的电视剧，也是去年红星大奖大赢家，囊括最佳男女主角、男女配角和最高收视率电视剧。故事围绕在荷兰村卖椰浆饭的莫家、开洗衣店的林家、饮食集团恶霸杨家。他们在荷兰村成长、做生意、谈恋爱。碰到各种各样的问题，有开心、有失意、有阻难，但在亲情的力量中，一切都引刃而解。

programme.title: 摩尔庄园 Mole's World - EP 25
programme.desc: This is the story of ordinary little Moer - Mo Lele who uses his super power to transform into LeLe Knight to fight against the evil witch Kula and protect the manor. 摩尔庄园动画片讲述了一个普通的小摩尔——摩乐乐利用自己的超能力变身乐乐侠，对抗邪恶巫师库拉，保护庄园的故事。

programme.title: 哆啦A梦 New Doraemon - EP 192
programme.desc: New season of Doraemon. 在这系列卡通动画里，小朋友们将看到哆啦A梦 - 这只来自未来世界的机器猫，如何应用它的法宝，协助其主人大雄解决生活上的各种难题。

programme.title: 石器时代: 寻找传说中的宠物 Stoneage: The Legendary Pet S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: A passionate dreamer Woody, along with a baby pet dinosaur Moga, sets path to become the best pet trainer. Join Woody's journey as the action and comedy will keep your futuristic stone-age era a worthwhile adventure! 讲述梦想成为驯兽师的小男孩Woody与小宠物恐龙摩加（Moga）如何成为最佳宠物教练的冒险道路。

programme.title: 搜密.打卡.小红点 Little Red Dot Detectives - EP 4
programme.desc: Tiong Bahru, is not only one of the oldest housing estates in Singapore, but also a district with many hidden secrets!Have you wondered where lies Tan Tock Seng or the air bomb shelter from World War II? Do you know how do Singapore's first HDB flats built during colonial era look like? Come along with our hosts to uncover Tiong Bahru! 中峇鲁是新加坡最古老的住宅区，也有很多潮流咖啡厅，但还有很多鲜为人知的事！想看陈笃生墓园，或是二战遗留的防空壕？你知道新加坡从殖民地时代就建造的第一代祖屋是什么样子的吗？那就随着主持人一起去探索中峇鲁吧

programme.title: 星期二特写 - 我就是我 Tuesday Report - Be Myself - EP 1
programme.desc: 27-year-old John Chung gave up his university in pursuit of his dream. After serving the nation for 2 years, John devoted his time and savings in building up his second-hand shoes and shoe polishing business. In 2018, he was in London to take part in the World Championships in Shoe Shining and was crowned the shoe shining champion of the year. After 6 years of hard work, John finally owns a retail shoe shop. He has a bigger dream to master the skills and become a professional bespoke shoemaker 现年27岁的曾荏舜为了追逐梦想，放弃念大学。服完兵役后，他靠着微薄的积蓄投身于售卖二手皮鞋和擦皮鞋生意。潜心专研擦鞋技巧让他在2018年夺下了英国伦敦世界擦鞋比赛的冠军。打拼六年，曾荏舜终于有了自己的鞋店，每天西装笔挺为顾客擦鞋,零售皮鞋，开课传授擦鞋手艺，目前正迈向开创定制皮鞋的梦想迈进。

programme.title: 陪你走千里 With You, A 1000 Miles - EP 7
programme.desc: "With You, A 1000 miles" is a cross platform doc-reality format program that will audition, select and track the 1000 miles journey of a pair of father-son or husband-wife or brother-sister or grandparent-grandchildren or close friends, as they undertake the life transforming road trip of their lives. (重)《陪你走千里》是个写实记录节目。节目会以面试的方式选取一对情侣／父子／夫妻／姐弟／祖孙，并跟随他们参与一场长达千里，改变人生的旅程。

programme.title: 我在你左右 With You - EP 15
programme.desc: Wen-an gets involved in a minor accident with Zhang Yang and tries to stop the latter from leaving to no avail. Zhang Yang gets killed in another accident almost immediately. Wen-an becomes his only "bridge". (重)主演：彭耀顺饰周文安；陈汉玮饰张扬；瑞恩饰叶思琪；潘淑钦饰赵美香；黄炯耀饰张伟；鹤天赐饰张焕；陈澍城饰张永盛。

programme.title: 小店铺 Little Shops - EP 6
programme.desc: The alluring aroma of coffee beans brought Belinda Lee to their doorstep. Facing her is a factory-looking like shop without any logo, just 3 faces from 3 generations. Flooded with cafe culture inspirations, and indie aspirations, can she convince the shop owner (s) and triple assure them that an overdue makeover is dying to happen? 浓郁的咖啡香把主持人李心钰带到了一家陈旧咖啡店。咖啡店里没有任何的招牌，只有三代人的照片。面对着许多新颖咖啡座带来的竞争，李心钰该如何劝服老板为店改头换面呢？

programme.title: 空中访民情 A Conversation with Minister 2019 - EP 5
programme.desc: The new series of "A Conversation with Minister" brings together Ministers, Senior Minister of State, Senior Parliamentary Secretary and guests to discuss issues such as education, employment, health, family and economy that are close to the heart of every Singaporean. The Ministers will also respond to views expressed by the public in street interviews. Helmed by Radio Presenter Lim Leng Kee and News and Current Affairs presenter Soh Bee Lan

programme.title: 阿公来做饭 Ah Gong Can Cook - EP 4
programme.desc: Get ready to be swooned by our celebrity guest, Qi Yu Wu as he sweeps Kym off her feet simply with his presence! Today, our suave Ah Gong brings along with him the delectable Babi Belacan passed down by his late mother. Coupled with Nasi Minyak, he manages to impress our hosts and Chef Eric Neo with two simple home cooked dishes. 这一集邀来了两位型男！一位是翩翩君子，戚玉武，另一位则是散发男人味的阿公，让钟琴神魂颠倒！阿公这回带来了妈妈的家传菜，是外头吃不到的娘惹峇拉煎焖猪肉，再配搭美味的马来油饭。名厨，Chef Eric Neo也将分享他的小贴士。

programme.title: 梦想程式 Dream Coder (HD) - EP 1
programme.desc: Began Mobile Apps develops mobile apps for enterprises. Product Director, Zhong Zhen Long, plays the mediator as both Program engineers, He Jian Ming and Fang Ru, have disagreements when creating an app. Zhen Long's sister, Ya Yun, leads a wealthy life as she married Ou Yang Fan who is the boss of a spectacles chain. The cheque Ou Yang Fan issues to Xu Guang Da, a representative for an Agency, bounced. Xu Guang Da goes to Ou Yang Fan's house and unintentionally sees Ya Yun in her sexy nightwear. Began Mobile Apps是一家流动应用程式开发公司，为企业制作手机程式，程式工程师何建明和方如为了制作应用程式而闹不合，产品总监钟镇隆扮演和事佬。镇隆的姐姐雅芸嫁给眼镜连锁店老板欧阳凡，过着少奶奶的生活。欧阳凡开给代理公司的支票跳票，代理公司销售代表徐广达来到欧阳凡家，意外见到穿着性感睡衣的雅芸。

programme.title: 狮城6点半 Singapore Today - EP 60
programme.desc: (Live) Daily updates on local news headlines and stories. （现场直播）《狮城6点半》每日为您提供最全面的本地新闻头条与报道。

programme.title: 春花望露 Spring Flower - EP 350
programme.desc: Ep350 - Meihui teaches Guangming a lesson when she discovers that he has falsified Junnan's will. On the other hand, Lihua plans to siphon off Youtu's assets before the divorce, but fails. 美惠发现光明伪造俊男的遗嘱，即把他狠狠教训一顿。丽华打算在离婚前把有土的钱财掏空，但暂未成功。

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight - EP 26
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news. 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。

programme.title: 爱玩客之移动厨房 2019 IWalker - Moving Kitchen 2019 - EP 4
programme.desc: Follow Li Yi and Yan Yong Lie as they embark on a tour round Taiwan whipping up yummy cuisines and hearty desserts. 延续上集李易永烈在第一阶段试菜后，将再继续品尝各式料理培养灵感。包括各种海鲜汇集的海天锅；分为四种辣度，辣到全身爆汗的辣排骨锅；前进最热闹的弘大商圈，品尝道地起司热狗、韩式鸡蛋糕、鱼糕串。最后制作两道泡菜创意料理，好好慰劳一下辛苦醃制泡菜的韩国阿珠嬷。

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 Mars Vs Venus - EP 17
programme.desc: (R) There is a limit to how much guys can dote on women. Is it really true doting men will bring about "Spoilt Women"? Ian Fang shares his own love story and imparts skills on how to dote on girlfriends! Let's see how the guests from Mars and Venus "fight" for their stand on this topic! (重)女人可以疼但不能宠，否则会持宠生娇！女人真的被宠就会变坏，变得不可理喻吗？方伟杰在节目中与大家分享自己的情史，同时还传授"宠女友"心得！男女嘉宾为了争"宠"而互相开炮，精彩绝伦；你绝对不能错过！

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 68
programme.desc: (R) Yinghao is sued for compensation and his assets are seized temporarily. Xiuqing's family members have nowhere to go to. Zhenshu suggests that Shuzi and Meici stay with her for the time being. Shuzi and Meici agree as they do not have the means to source for a place to stay. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)公司对英鎬提出赔偿要求，英鎬的房子被查封，财产被假扣押。秀卿一家人没有地方住，真淑于是建议秀卿带着淑子和美慈跟她一起住。淑子和美慈原本拒绝，但最后因为真的无处可去，只好勉为其难地到真淑家去。

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 25
programme.desc: (R) Zhixu decides to prosecute Xianxiu with an unusual rape charge with the intention to provoke Xianxiu into speaking the truth of his case. Xianxiu gets worked up in court under the provocation of Zhixu. He inadvertently reveals that he has murdered other persons and the location where he has hidden the murder weapon. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)为了刺激贤秀讲出案件的真相，智旭决定以特殊强奸罪起诉贤秀。贤秀在法庭上经不起智旭言语的一再刺激而变得暴躁，不经意地说出了自己杀害另外几人的事情和他隐藏做案凶器的地点。

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 17
programme.desc: Knowing that Yunxue saved her husband, Zhiyuan informed her that she is hired as their company lawyer. When Zhiyuan saw Yunxue personally, she is stunned that Yunxue resembles Ruli. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)道英答应让尹雪来WID上班, 智媛打电话尹雪。当智媛看到尹雪后非常害怕, 因为眼前的女人与如莉长得一模一样。

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 18
programme.desc: Zhiyuan suspects Yunxue is Ruli, so she hires someone to prove Yunxue's real identity. She did a DNA test with Yunxue and her mother's hair and the result reveals a genetic relationship. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)智媛怀疑尹雪从一开始就是故意接近自己家。她坚称尹雪就是如莉, 便私下派人调查尹雪的父母, 偷取她们的头发做DNA的检验。智媛得到的验证结果显示末年与尹雪是亲子关系。

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 5
programme.desc: Aidan wakes up in the hospital where he learns that Xiao Hong has brain haemorrhage and needs to be operated on immediately. Aidan is guilt-ridden and wants to lie to save Xiao Hong's life when he suddenly remembers that the old lady warned him about losing something precious. He worries his lie will bring harm to Nadia and to De Hua. But when he remembers the bonds he built with Xiao Hong, he still decides to lie to save her... (PG)Aidan 醒来发现自己在病床，医生告知小红脑严重出血，须马上动手术。Aidan 自责心痛，想撒谎救小红，想起老太婆说的代价—会失去最珍惜的人。Aidan 担心会祸害德华和Nadia，内心挣扎。后闪忆和小红的父女情画面，决定撒谎救小红。

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 21
programme.desc: Priestess A'si decides to make use of Devil King's soft spot for Demonic Lady to get him to capture Sanzang for her. Subsequently, Priestess A'si also threatens General Winter to obey her or she will get rid of Summer Fairy. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)阿斯女察觉魔王的弱点，决定利用魔王对罗刹女的思念指使魔王帮她得到三藏。接着，阿斯女还威胁冬将军，要他帮助她，否则把夏仙女除掉。

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight

This episode, let us meet some Singaporean students and see how they have travelled all the way to the United States to pursue their dreams. (重)美国是一个吸引着世界各地年轻人追求梦想的地方。付出万般努力就为了能在这片土地上创造自己的价值，为未来埔路。这一集就让我们来看一看远赴他乡的几位新加坡学子，如何在美国一步一脚印的追逐他们的梦想。

programme.desc: (R) Xiantai is suspicious of Zaiyong when he recalls that the police told him that Director Song last spoke to Zaiyong before his accident. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)贤泰突然想到之前警方说宋院长出车祸前最后跟载永通电话。贤泰怀疑载永跟车祸有关，询问院长。院长用眨眼的方式向贤泰证实是载永撞倒他的。贤泰为了查清真相，决定当载永的司机，以便寻找行车记录器里的录影。

Zhiyuan learns from Yunxue's parents that they have a lost twin daughter. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)道英反对智媛将尹雪辞退，因为尹雪妈妈拥有公司想要买的地皮。智媛不愿善罢甘休，她再次找到末年夫妇想打探关于尹雪的事情，末年说尹雪是双胞胎，但是在孩子百日的时候却弄丢了另外一个，智媛更加迷惑了。

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 20
programme.desc: Wulie bought a necklace for Yunxue but the latter asked him to give it to Haizhu to please her. Yunxue secretly bought a similar necklace for herself. Haizhu flares up when she sees Yunxue wearing the same design necklace given by Wulie. Overwhelmed by suspicions of an affair between Yunxue and Wulie, Haizhu fainted. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)武烈给尹雪送了一条珍珠项链，但尹雪叫他拿回去讨好海珠。尹雪却偷偷私厎下购买一模一样的项链。海珠看到了将尹雪的项链生气得把它扯了下来，怀疑他们在一起，最后激动得晕了过去。

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 9
programme.desc: From local egg tarts, braised delicacies to mala hotpot, which dish will leave a lasting impression? In this episode, Host Michelle Chia explores flavoursome dishes captured in the novels of 3 renowned female Hong Kong authors. 道地的蛋挞，醇香的卤味、独特的甜点、麻辣的火锅，究竟哪一种滋味是香港作家笔墨间最让人回味的料理？这一集，主持人谢韵仪探索了三位女作家笔下的香港美食，通过味觉去体会作家笔墨间所表达的情感。

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 22
programme.desc: Devil King is injured when he tries to take on 99 punishments to stop Demonic Lady from going through reincarnation again. Pigsy requests for Summer Fairy to warm Devil King's house to make him feel better. Priestess A'si wants General Winter to take the chance to steal Devil King's urn for her. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)魔王为了让罗刹女不再承受轮回之苦，想独自接收99发惩罚罗刹女的煞气，结果中了寒毒后失明。八戒希望冬将军带着夏仙女到魔王的家把房子变得温暖些。阿斯女于是指使冬将军到魔王的家吧装有三藏的血的香炉拿给她。

programme.title: 购物乐 (商业资讯) JML Home Shopping - Infomercial
烧。卖 Served H.O.T. - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) For the third challenge, they had to make Chendol. Fugui knew that Meiwei was very good at making Chendol and Tai Long would be of no match for her. Little did he know that Meiwei deliberately performed under her standards to lose to Tai Long, who also coincidentally made bad Chendol. (重)三个年轻人即将得到老字号南洋风味小吃店价值一百万的Laksa祖传秘方。他们是风雨同舟的兄弟：商业奇才庄浩伦（包勋评饰）、刀神陈欧文（方伟杰饰）和烹饪天才何泰龙（冯伟衷饰），合称“H.O.T”。三个前科犯准备接管生意，创造更好的生活。他们将遇到为厨师梦而孤军奋战的曾美薇（雅慧饰）、扬言破坏他们声誉的大厨Gordon（George Young饰）和破坏弟弟泰龙幸福的泰虎（李腾饰）。H.O.T之间的忠诚和成功将会因为过去的阴影而再次接受挑战。

programme.title: 线人2 Fixer 2 - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Fortune is everywhere in Raub of Pahang, Malaysia and everyone is a millionaire there. The economic benfits are brought about by the Mao Shan Wang durians and durian farm owners in Sungai Klau have admitted that they have hit the jackpot. How can durian indulgence develop into a national industry? (重)马来西亚彭亨州的劳勿县仿佛遍地黄金，拿块石头随便丢，都可以砸到一个百万富翁。说的是榴梿猫山王带来的经济效益。双溪吉流的榴梿园主都自认押对了宝，吃榴梿从纯味蕾享受发展至国民产业，到底是怎样的一番风雨路？

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 70
programme.desc: (R) Bafeng finds Zaiyong's memory card in the office. Jia-en leads Bafeng to reveal where he has kept the memory card when Bafeng is drunk. She wants to pass the memory card to Xiantai in exchange for his love. When Xiantai rejects her advances, Jia-en goes to Zaiyong instead. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)八峰在办公室里找一张记忆卡，发现是载永撞倒宋院长的，于是拿着记忆卡威胁载永。佳恩灌醉八峰，诱导他说出记忆卡藏在哪里。佳恩本来希望用记忆卡交换贤泰的感情，但贤泰拒绝跟她发展婚外情。佳恩于是投向载永。

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Fengshun passes by the construction site and witnesses the workers on the construction site beating a kindergarten school bus driver. In order to help the elderly driver, uses her mobile phone to call the police to stop the atrocity. A worker snatches her phone and throws it on the floor. They start fighting and Bong-soon ends up being arrested. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)都奉顺路过工地，看到了工地上的工人在殴打一个开幼儿园校车的司机，为了帮助年迈的司机，她拿出了手机报警，想要阻止这场暴行。另一个工人抓住奉顺的手机把它扔在地板上。双方开打，奉顺被捉到警察局。

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 21
programme.desc: As Haizhu wanted to test Yunxue's identity, she invited her for a seafood lunch. She knew that Ruli is allergic to seafood and ordered a feast of seafood before Yunxue arrived. Yunxue fainted after consuming seafood, and Daozi rushed her to the hospital. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)海珠想到一个妙计判定尹雪到底是不是如莉,约尹雪一起吃饭。海珠知道真正的如莉对海鲜过敏，因此在尹雪来之前就已经点了大量的海鲜.用餐后,尹雪因严重过敏而晕了过去，道治急将尹雪送往医院。

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 22
programme.desc: Wulie learns about Yunxue's allergy to seafood and her admission to hospital and deduces that Yunxue is Ruli. Yunxue lies to him that Ruli is her lost twin sister. Wulie is confused. Daozi expresses his affection for Yunxue. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)武烈称呼尹雪为如莉，並说他已经在医院确认过她吃海鲜过敏之事，无可奈何下尹雪解释自己有一个双胞胎妹妹，因此才会有同样的反应，武烈再次陷入困惑。另一面，道治向尹雪表示爱意。

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 3
programme.desc: Childhood leukaemia or blood cancer takes at least 2-years to treat. Danny Yeo visits the only hospital in the capital city of Fujian province that provides specialized treatment and holistic care. For financially-strapped families, it's one of the last places to find hope towards complete healing. 中国大城市看病贵、看病难，但最好的癌症治疗集中此处。杨君伟陪白血病儿童家庭踏上求医之路，看举目无亲的他们如何在陌生城市安身治病。多亏社会力量，他们才能坚持漫长的抗癌斗争，等孩子痊愈，一起返乡。

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 16
programme.desc: Shanmei contemplates summoning Wukong to help her when she realises that Priestess A'si is trying to switch their souls. However, Shanmei decides to do as Priestess A'si commands when she hears that Wukong may die if she were to summon him. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)善美发现她的灵魂即将跟阿斯女的灵魂对调了，于是想召唤悟空帮忙。阿斯女向善美透露其实善美和悟空是必杀的缘分，若善美召唤悟空，那悟空很可能会丧命。善美为了保护悟空，决定代替阿斯女在石棺长眠。

programme.title: 离家。出走 Greener Pastures - EP 3
programme.desc: A survey shows that 80% of Taiwan's working population wants to work overseas and Singapore is their most popular destination. Singapore is chosen not only for the higher wages, but also for the opportunities to broaden their horizons and to study English, while giving them a chance to become more independent. 为了摆脱台币22K低薪，台湾人正在成为全球最新一波的低阶移工。调查显示，8成台湾上班族想出走海外。新加坡是最热门的目的地。选择新加坡，除了薪水，有些人则是因为想学英语、希望开拓视野、学习独立。他们带着勇气、梦想和挣扎离家，在新的起点开始起跑。

programme.title: 吃。东西 World Food - EP 1
programme.desc: China, Arabia and Italy have their own take on the origin of noodles. Are noodles really originated from China? In this episode, Guo Liang, Axian and Pornsak discuss about noodles and pastas' history, specialty, evolution, production and ways of eating in China, Japan, Italy, Singapore and Malaysia. 中国，阿拉伯和意大利三国，对于面条的历史起源都各有其说辞。面条是否起源自中国 这集节目让郭亮，阿贤和Pornsak为我们介绍中国各地区，日本，意大利和新马地区各种面食的历史，特色，演变，制作和吃法。sdfsdgd

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 85
programme.desc: Ep 71: Xiantai finds a speeding ticket in Zaiyong's car and realizes that Zaiyong has been filmed speeding near the location where Director Song was knocked down previously. The police brings Zaiyong back for questioning, but Jia-en testifies that she was with Zaiyong on the night of the accident. Ep 71: 贤泰发现载永放在车后座的违规单，知道载永在宋院长被撞倒当天在院长出事不远处超速。贤泰拿着违规单到警局去，要求警方展开调查。载永被带回警局问话，佳恩出面说事发当晚她跟载永在一起。

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 2
programme.desc: Recently, An Minhe, the CEO of a software company, Ainsoft, received anonymous threats, blackmails, and has even been stalked, he decides to hire the incredibly strong Fengshun as his bodyguard. 最近安敏赫，一家软件开发公司的CEO正受到威胁和跟踪.他突然觉得这个拥有非一般能力的奉顺，似乎可以解决自己的烦恼，决定采用奉顺为自己的保镖。

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 23
programme.desc: Yunxue confessed that she is Ruli when Wulie produced proof of her real identity and threatened to report her to the police. She said that she misses him and wants to return to his side. Feeling guilty about deserting her in the past, he promises to divorce Haizhu after he gains control of WID group. 武烈告诉尹雪他已经拿到了徐末年曾经与如莉在同一个监狱服刑的证据，面对铁证尹雪只能承认自己就是如莉。尹雪声泪俱下地说再次回来是因为忘不了武烈。武烈很愧疚自己曾经离开如莉，希望能跟她和好，也对他承诺等他拿到了WID集团的一切，就跟海珠离婚。

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 24
programme.desc: Daoying and Zhiyuan agree to let Daozi and Yunxue be together. Their main motive is to get the piece of land from Monian's hand. Yunxue accidentally breaks Xiaochun's urn and fainted when she sees no ash inside the urn. 为了夺走末年手中的一块地，智媛与道英答应道治来往。埋着小春的园林要搬移，尹雪把装有小春的骨灰罐挖出来了，失魂落魄地抱着骨灰罐离开时不小心打碎了罐子，却意外发现里面什么也没有，大受激动晕了过去。

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 11
programme.desc: The Bosnian War has recorded the most tragic history and ethnic conflict. 200,000 people were killed and 2 million people became refugees. Visit former war criminals in Bosnia, Croatia and Serbia to learn about the historical entanglement of the war and how they deal with their grudge after the war. 波黑内战记载着最悲壮的历史，道不同不相为谋的种族纷争，20万人丧命，200万人沦为难民，走访波斯尼亚，克罗地亚和塞尔维亚前战犯，了解这段内战的历史纠结。三族人民在内战后，如何处理各自内心难解的怨恨。

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 16
programme.desc: Ep 23: Shanmei contemplates summoning Wukong to help her when she realises that Priestess A'si is trying to switch their souls. However, Shanmei decides to do as Priestess A'si commands when she hears that Wukong may die if she were to summon him.Ep 24: General Winter says the only chance to switch Shanmei's soul back to her body is when Priestess A'si falls asleep. Wukong kisses Priestess A'si and transfers some medicine to her during the process, causing her to fall asleep against her wish Ep 23: 善美发现她的灵魂即将跟阿斯女的灵魂对调了，于是想召唤悟空帮忙。阿斯女向善美透露其实善美和悟空是必杀的缘分，若善美召唤悟空，那悟空很可能会丧命。善美为了保护悟空，决定代替阿斯女在石棺长眠。Ep 24: 冬将军说只要阿斯女睡着，就有机会把三藏的灵魂换回来。但阿斯女十分警惕，一直不肯睡着。悟空故意吻阿斯女，让她吞下一些药后睡着。

Feeling guilty about deserting her in the past, he promises to divorce Haizhu after he gains control of WID group. 武烈告诉尹雪他已经拿到了徐末年曾经与如莉在同一个监狱服刑的证据，面对铁证尹雪只能承认自己就是如莉。尹雪声泪俱下地说再次回来是因为忘不了武烈。武烈很愧疚自己曾经离开如莉，希望能跟她和好，也对他承诺等他拿到了WID集团的一切，就跟海珠离婚。

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 24
programme.desc: Daoying and Zhiyuan agree to let Daozi and Yunxue be together. Their main motive is to get the piece of land from Monian's hand. Yunxue accidentally breaks Xiaochun's urn and fainted when she sees no ash inside the urn. 为了夺走末年手中的一块地，智媛与道英答应道治来往。埋着小春的园林要搬移，尹雪把装有小春的骨灰罐挖出来了，失魂落魄地抱着骨灰罐离开时不小心打碎了罐子，却意外发现里面什么也没有，大受激动晕了过去。

programme.title: 看见你的声音 I Can See Your Voice - EP 2
programme.desc: I Can See Your Voice is a reality show in which guests must attempt to determine whether the contestant is a skilled vocalist or a tone-deaf contestant without hearing them sing. 《看見你的声音》是一档嘉宾凭视觉判断选手是否专业演唱实力还是音痴的新概念推理类音乐综艺节目。

programme.title: 开门七件事 Essential 7 - EP 6
programme.desc: How did the "Essential 7" as we know and enjoy come to be? Just how are they processed and what revolutionary transformations did they undergo? (重)七件事经过了哪些处理程序，经历了怎样的革命性改变，才成就了今天我们日常生活中所品，所闻，所见的柴米油盐醋茶？

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 87
programme.desc: Ep 72: Xiantai leads Zaiyong into believing that Director Song has regained his ability to speak. As expected by Xiantai, someone sneaks into Director Song's ward that night and attempts to silence him. Just as everyone assumes that Zaiyong has been caught, the intruder is revealed to be Bafeng. Ep 72: 贤泰设下陷阱，故意让载永以为宋院长已经可以说话了。果然不出贤泰所料，有人在深夜潜进病房，企图谋害宋院长。正当大家以为已经抓到载永的把柄，该人却是八峰。八峰指被载永指使。

programme.title: 大力女都奉顺 Strong Girl Bong-Soon - EP 3
programme.desc: Police officer Yin Guodou, requests protection for Fengshun as she had witnessed the kidnapping and the seen the kidnapper but the police officer watching over Fengshun is stabbed at the company meeting. 警察印国斗要求对丰顺提供安全保护因为丰顺看到凶手的长相，奉顺身后多出了一个负责保护她的警员，这个警员却在敏赫公司的一场会议上受到了袭击。

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 25
programme.desc: Yunxue (Ruli) suspects that Xiaochun is still alive, they checked with the Director of the orphanage who confirmed that Xiaochun is still alive. Meanwhile, Wulie flares up after learning that Daoying is grooming Haizhu to be his successor. He urges Yunxue(Ruli) to collaborate with him to take over WID group. 尹雪决定跟末年夫妇一起去福利院找院长，院长告诉尹雪，春儿并没有死. 武烈亲耳听到道英将提拔海珠做集团的接班人，他非常生气，便告诉尹雪尽快计划将WID集团吞掉

programme.title: 没有名字的女人 Unknown Woman - EP 26
programme.desc: Yunxue(Ruli) seeks information about Xiaochun from the hospital. She brings Xiaochun's medical report back to the office and is discovered by Wulie. While Wulie is reading the report, Zhiyuan is infuriated when she sees him checking on Xiaochun. 尹雪设法从医院打听小春资料，将小春的求诊记录带回办公室，被武烈无意中看到。智媛看到武烈拿着小春的病例非常生气，武烈只能解释说自己好奇小春的死因。

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 3 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 3 - EP 2
programme.desc: Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. 介绍台湾在地食材的故事，也是台湾最深刻的人生故事。故事的主角们，有的为着有机农业奋斗打拼，为这片土地奉献青春与血汗。 有的则是经过千百次的调味与尝试，只为了成就一道美味料理。对比着经营者与料理人的故事，他们或是为生活中年转业、或是离乡背井追寻梦想，人生路上各自遭逢百转千折的冲突与适应，才能在逆境中成功蜕变。

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 17
programme.desc: Ep 25: Shanmei finally leaves her dream. Devil King has the chance to eliminate Priestess A'si, but at the critical moment, Priestess A'si tells Devil King that his son is still alive. Devil King thus releases Priestess A'si in the hope of locating his son.Ep 26: Wukong meets Erget who worked alongside the former Tripitaka. Erget tells Wukong that the Heavenly Sword and a formidable demon will soon appear. Erget pleads with Wukong to end her life with the Heavenly Sword once he has eliminate Ep 25: 善美终于握着悟空的手一起离开梦境。魔王本来准备收服阿斯女，阿斯女却在这时告诉魔王他的孩子其实还没死。魔王为了确认阿斯女的话，故意放走阿斯女。Ep 26: 悟空与白鹭见面，发现白鹭是上一世的三藏的守护者。白鹭告诉悟空天剑以及可以毁灭世界的厉鬼即将出现。白鹭恳请悟空在消灭厉鬼后用天剑结束她的生命，因为失去三藏的她已经没有活着的理由了。

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight - EP 24

programme.title: 梦想的声音 2 Sound Of My Dream 2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Produced by the same people behind Sing!, Sound of My Dream boasts 5 top-notch mentors, (Sandy Lam, JJ Lin, Yu Quan Group, Jane Zhang), impressive sets and production, and a very unique contest format. The contest witnesses the challenges and preparation each mentor puts into their performances as they prove their worth. And it features stellar performances from mentors and amateurs alike. 本季四组常驻导师为羽泉、林忆莲、林俊杰和张靓颖，主持人为华少。另从本季开始新设立客座导师一位，称之为“神秘导师”，每期更换。第二季在选歌方式与上季不同，选歌、定歌都在录影前，练歌则是在录影前6小时之内完成（上季只有3小时，这季增加音樂導師练歌时间）；6小时后在舞台将直接接受追梦歌手讨教。

programme.title: Wasabi 新体验 Find The Wasabi 2 - EP 8
programme.desc: "Find the Wasabi 2" is a 'reality-game travelogue' series featuring 3 Asian celebrities who are on a special mission to find the 'secret spice' of Japan... In each episode, the Hunters are challenged by a powerful "Commander" to solve 'mysteries' about Japan that puzzle people around the world. (重)WASABI新体验第二季再出击，徐鸣杰将与来自泰国及马来西亚的朋友在日本学习当忍者，通过不同的任务竞赛，探索不为人知的日本文化，带给你潮流、美食、旅游等第一手资料，发现日本新魅力！这一系列的Wasabi主持人是性感女神藤原纪香。

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 5
programme.desc: Aidan wakes up in the hospital where he learns that Xiao Hong has brain haemorrhage and needs to be operated on immediately. Aidan is guilt-ridden and wants to lie to save Xiao Hong's life when he suddenly remembers that the old lady warned him about losing something precious. He worries his lie will bring harm to Nadia and to De Hua. But when he remembers the bonds he built with Xiao Hong, he still decides to lie to save her... Aidan 醒来发现自己在病床，医生告知小红脑严重出血，须马上动手术。Aidan 自责心痛，想撒谎救小红，想起老太婆说的代价—会失去最珍惜的人。Aidan 担心会祸害德华和Nadia，内心挣扎。后闪忆和小红的父女情画面，决定撒谎救小红。

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 11
programme.desc: The Bosnian War has recorded the most tragic history and ethnic conflict. 200,000 people were killed and 2 million people became refugees. Visit former war criminals in Bosnia, Croatia and Serbia to learn about the historical entanglement of the war and how they deal with their grudge after the war. 波黑内战记载着最悲壮的历史，道不同不相为谋的种族纷争，20万人丧命，200万人沦为难民，走访波斯尼亚，克罗地亚和塞尔维亚前战犯，了解这段内战的历史纠结。三族人民在内战后，如何处理各自内心难解的怨恨。

programme.title: 爷爷的路 My Grandfather's Road - EP 4
programme.desc: My Grandfather's Road aims to uncover even more roads in Singapore named after notable founding fathers and pioneers through their descendants. Through in-depth interviews, archive footages and show and tells, we will learn more about the country's past as well as the people who helped make Singapore the success that it is today. (重)《爷爷的路》的目的是发现更多以开国元勋和先锋而命名的马路。通过深入采访他们的子孙后裔、录像档案、演出和口述，让我们对国家的历史以及建国功臣们有更加深入的了解。

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 39
programme.desc: Ep 39: Xiuzi finds out that Guixi also does not come from a rich family and urges her to be sympathetic towards Yuzhen. Unexpectedly however, Guixi tells Xiuzi to stop Yuzhen from pestering the married Yiyuan. Xiuzi is shocked as she did not know that Yiyuan is engaged. Ep 39: 秀子查到贵熙其实不是出身名门，而是父母早逝，从小寄居在叔叔家，过着辛苦的日子。秀子要贵熙将心比心，体谅宇真的处境，但贵熙反而要宇真别再纠缠有夫之妇。秀子不知道艺苑已经订婚，一时不知所措。

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 40
programme.desc: Ep 40: Yiyuan slaps Haixiu when Haixiu admits that she has fallen for Yuzhen. Yuzhen witnesses the incident and reprimands Yiyuan for being unreasonable. However, Yiyuan does not think she is at fault. Ep 40: 海秀到餐厅报到，被艺苑质问是否喜欢宇真。海秀承认喜欢宇真，被艺苑打了一巴掌。宇真目睹海秀被掌掴，指责艺苑霸道，但艺苑却觉得自己一点错都没有。

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 19
programme.desc: Ep 24 Haila bumps into Sharon and is shocked to realise that she has lost her memory. Xiuhao urges Haila to tie knot as soon as possible. Ep 25 Sharon regains her memory upon seeing Xiuhao and Haila's wedding photo. Xiuhao's car is tampered and causes a serious accident but he survived unhurt. Ep 24 海拉把雪伦缝制的红外套还给雪伦的助理时，她碰见失去记忆的雪伦，大感震惊。秀浩向海拉提议尽快完成婚礼。Ep 25 雪伦在看到秀浩与海拉的婚照后恢复记忆。秀浩的车被人动手脚，遭导致他发生严重车祸，交通意外，但秀浩却毫发无伤。

programme.title: 我身后的陶斯 My Secret, Terrius - EP 4
programme.desc: NIS agent Zhiyan sneaks into Wen Chengzhu's house to spy and bumps into Jin Ben. She wants to know the contact address of Jin Ben, who is her ex-colleague. programme.title: 异口同声 Who Is The Real Singer - EP 4
programme.desc: Hosted by Chen Huan, Pop stars and impersonators face off to be the last one standing as the panel of singing judges try to determine the real singer by listening to their voices only. 由陈欢主持《异口同声》是一个大型猜评推理音乐节目，由陈欢主持。节目邀请乐坛代表性歌手讲述金曲背后故事，同时邀请模唱歌手用他们以假乱真的声线向专业猜评团发起挑战。专业猜评团由张宇、黄国伦、刘维、魏巡、马松、冯提莫组成。

programme.title: 美食世家 2 Food Empire 2 - EP 2

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 9
programme.desc: From local egg tarts, braised delicacies to mala hotpot, which dish will leave a lasting impression? In this episode, Host Michelle Chia explores flavoursome dishes captured in the novels of 3 renowned female Hong Kong authors. 道地的蛋挞，醇香的卤味、独特的甜点、麻辣的火锅，究竟哪一种滋味是香港作家笔墨间最让人回味的料理？这一集，主持人谢韵仪探索了三位女作家笔下的香港美食，通过味觉去体会作家笔墨间所表达的情感。

programme.title: 寻找原之味 Food Old Days - EP 11
programme.desc: Singapore is heralded as the Food Paradise and Singaporeans' favourite pastime includes searching out for the best hawker and local cuisines in every corner on the island. However, many traditional food fares are now on the brink of vanishing. Many of these stall owners are either old or retiring and found no one to succeed their businesses even though they may be thriving. (重)新加坡号称美食天堂，新加坡人最喜爱的休闲活动之一就是全岛搜寻最好吃的熟食档、到全岛各角落品尝本地美食。然而，随着时代进步、空间变迁，许多传统美食因为后继无人而渐渐消失，许多传统做法因为科技而渐渐失传。

programme.title: 寻医 A Medical Journey - EP 3
programme.desc: Childhood leukaemia or blood cancer takes at least 2-years to treat. Danny Yeo visits the only hospital in the capital city of Fujian province that provides specialized treatment and holistic care. For financially-strapped families, it's one of the last places to find hope towards complete healing. 中国大城市看病贵、看病难，但最好的癌症治疗集中此处。杨君伟陪白血病儿童家庭踏上求医之路，看举目无亲的他们如何在陌生城市安身治病。多亏社会力量，他们才能坚持漫长的抗癌斗争，等孩子痊愈，一起返乡。
